name: iban-generator
title: Belgian Iban Generator
description: Generate and copy valid Belgian IBAN numbers with proper formatting and validation
author: m44rten1

commands.name: generate-iban
commands.title: Generate Iban
commands.description: Generate a random Belgian IBAN number and copy it to clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
